LanguageData.Silage.label: 青贮饲料
LanguageData.Silage.description: Silage is nutrient-rich fermented hay and raw food product suitable for animal feed. The fermentation process preserves the silage and prevents it from rotting.
LanguageData.NeutroPetals.label: 中性花瓣
LanguageData.NeutroPetals.description: Beautiful Yellow-Orange Petals from the Neutro Flower. Used to make Neutroamine, a medicine base.
LanguageData.HerbalMedicaKit.label: 草药包
LanguageData.HerbalMedicaKit.description: A small pack of mixed herbs. It is less potent than industrial pharmaceuticals.
LanguageData.aloe.label: 芦荟叶
LanguageData.aloe.description: A bundle of Aloe Leaves from an Aloe Plant. Aloe Leaves are used as a type of natural medicine.
LanguageData.RawCaoutchouc.label: 天然橡胶
LanguageData.RawCaoutchouc.description: Caoutchouc is a natural rubber sap collected from a Hevea Tree. It can be vulcanized to create useful rubber materials.
